basics.name: Jacob Elnaggar
basics.label: MD/PhD Candidate
basics.summary: MD/PhD candidate pursuing radiation oncology with a research focus on cancer biology and computational methods.

education.institution: Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center

work.name: MD Anderson Cancer Center
work.summary: Conducted translational microbiome and cancer research using molecular and computational methods in Dr. Lauren Colbert's lab.

volunteer.summary: Provided healthcare services to underserved populations in the New Orleans community.
Organized a donation drive and fundraiser raising over $2,000 and collecting multiple truckloads of supplies.
Volunteered at a shelter for individuals experiencing homelessness, assisting with repairs, meals, and coordination of student volunteers.
Counselor at a weeklong day camp for children with special needs, ensuring safety and engagement.
Hosted and guided medical school interviewees, representing LSUHSC to prospective students.
Trained peers and healthcare professional students in basic life support.

awards.title: Alpha Omega Alpha Honor Medical Society
